description: Looking for an easy burger recipe? Try this American-style pulled pork burger. It's ready in just 15 minutes and you only need four ingredients.
keywords: Pulled pork burger,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High protein,Tree nut free,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Budget
name: American-Style Pulled Pork Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 white jumbo hamburger rolls, split, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Using 1 1/2 tbs extra virgin olive oil, brush cut sides of rolls. Chargrill cut sides for 1 minute or until toasted.
Heat 2 tsp extra virgin olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Add pork, 1/4 cup water and half the sauce and cook for 4 minutes or until warmed through.
Place slaw in a bowl. Add dressing and toss to combine.
Top roll bases with slaw, pork and remaining sauce. Sandwich with roll tops and serve.
